revised_title: Rydberg Constants, e/m, and Fine Structures of Hydrogen and Deuterium
tldr: The authors determined the Rydberg constants, e/m ratio, and fine structures of hydrogen (Hx) and deuterium (Da) atoms using a reflexion echelon. They corrected some values of important constants that were affected by Birge's proposed change in the value of q, ensuring the accuracy of their findings.
